# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

find_package(linux-headers-generic REQUIRED)

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_rescompiler_bin
  TOOL_rescompiler_dependency
  tools/rescompiler/bin
  rescompiler
)

add_executable(yt-yql-tests-core_ut)


target_compile_options(yt-yql-tests-core_ut PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)

target_link_libraries(yt-yql-tests-core_ut PUBLIC
  linux-headers-generic::linux-headers-generic
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-cpp-cpuid_check
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  library-cpp-yson
  cpp-yson-node
  yql-essentials-ast
  yql-essentials-core
  core-cbo-simple
  essentials-core-facade
  essentials-core-services
  core-services-mounts
  essentials-core-file_storage
  qplayer-storage-memory
  providers-common-udf_resolve
  essentials-public-udf
  udf-service-exception_policy
  essentials-core-type_ann
  yt-lib-ut_common
  providers-common-provider
  common-schema-parser
  providers-result-provider
  yt-gateway-file
  providers-yt-provider
  yt-codec-codegen
  yt-comp_nodes-llvm14
  minikql-comp_nodes-llvm14
  minikql-invoke_builtins-llvm14
  essentials-sql-pg
  string_udf
  library-cpp-resource
)

target_allocator(yt-yql-tests-core_ut
  cpp-malloc-tcmalloc
  libs-tcmalloc-no_percpu_cache
)

target_link_options(yt-yql-tests-core_ut PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lpthread
  -lrt
  -ldl
  -lutil
)

target_sources(yt-yql-tests-core_ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yql/tests/core_ut/yql_execution_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yql/tests/core_ut/yql_expr_discover_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yql/tests/core_ut/yql_expr_providers_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yql/tests/core_ut/yql_rewrite_io_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yql/tests/core_ut/yql_qplayer_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/tests/core_ut/29426bb398266aa71971febaf21de1cf.cpp
)


set_property(
  TARGET
  yt-yql-tests-core_ut
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  1
)

add_yunittest(
  NAME
  yt-yql-tests-core_ut
  TEST_TARGET
  yt-yql-tests-core_ut
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  yt-yql-tests-core_ut
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  yt-yql-tests-core_ut
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  yt-yql-tests-core_ut
  PROPERTY
  TIMEOUT
  600
)

resources(yt-yql-tests-core_ut
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/tests/core_ut/29426bb398266aa71971febaf21de1cf.cpp
  INPUTS
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/cfg/tests/fs.conf
  KEYS
  fs.conf
  OPTS
)

vcs_info(yt-yql-tests-core_ut)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  yt-yql-tests-core_ut
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
